thread.title: Mrs Berry
thread.title_full: Glasses Direct reviewed by Mrs Berry

author: Mrs Berry
title: Mrs Berry
text: I was kept informed every step of the way via email, any questions they had on my prescription they asked first before going ahead. The glasses fit brilliantly and are good quality even the pair for Â£25.00. Their prices are really good and so is the service once I had replied to an email with a query the glasses were delivered in 3 days. I definitely use and recommended glasses direct to everyone
